splash.visitCeka: Dhi itim limbe e CEKA Community

search.placeholder: Manyo ofise mag IEBC kaluwore gi county, constituency, kata kama gintie...

office.noLocationAccess: Onge thuolo mar donjo kama entie

bottomSheet.locationAccessRequired: Dwarore thuolo mar donjo kama intie
bottomSheet.locationAccessDesc: Yie thuolo mar donjo kama intie mondo inene nengo wuoth, one yo, kendo imany ofis machiegni ahinya gi kama intie.
bottomSheet.enableLocationAccess: Yie thuolo mar donjo kama intie
bottomSheet.contributeLocation: Kony gi kar dak ma ofadho
bottomSheet.confirmOffice: Ji nyalo nyiso ka ofis adier
bottomSheet.locationNotStored: Kar dak ma oonyiso ok owe
bottomSheet.distanceAway: Iching'a {{distance}}m. Dwarore nibed machiegni gi {{maxDistance}}m mondo adier.
bottomSheet.locationPermissionRequired: Dwarore yie mondo adier. Yie thuolo mar donjo kama intie, eka item apiewi.
bottomSheet.tapForGoogleMaps: Tap ofis mondo one yo e Google Maps.

layers.satelliteDesc: Manyiso map mar picha motudore e kor polo
layers.iebcOfficesDesc: Kar dak duto mar ofis mar IEBC e Kenya
layers.constituenciesDesc: Kit ma gi chiemo e bunge gi kit ma ji otemo e Kenya ka IEBC oseketo. Alwora achiel nyiso alwora achiel gi code gi nyinge.
layers.healthcareFacilitiesDesc: Kar thieth duto e pinje Kenya (data mokwongo â€” nyalo doko ka idag kendo)
layers.counties: Data mar ji ma oseotemo e Kaunti mag Kenya
layers.countiesDesc: Kit ma kaunti duto e pinje Kenya
layers.locationPermissionRequired: Dwarore yie thuolo mar donjo kama intie
layers.aboutLayersDesc: Yany seth mondo ilok manyiso map. Inyalo ket seth mopogore gi map mopogore mondo inyalo neno weche mabey.

contribute.title: Kony gi Kar Dak ma Ofadho mar Ofis
contribute.description: Konywa ket kar dak duto mar ofis mar IEBC e Kenya ka ikony gi data madier mar kar dak.
contribute.googleMapsPlaceholder: Ket link mar Google Maps kata kar kwan
contribute.uploadEvidenceDesc: Picha mar ofis, alama, kata kar e ode manyiso kare
contribute.dragDropOrClick: Gwed gi kwayo kata tap mondo ipimo
contribute.movePin: Gwed pin mondo ilok kar dak madier
contribute.submissionSuccessDesc: Konyri oseowalo kendo nyaka onyis gi ji ma otime.
contribute.submissionNote: Weche: Nyiso kare mar ji okony mondo kar dak bedo adier. Erokri mondo okonye!
contribute.errorLocation: Tem mi kar dak mar ofis
contribute.errorInvalidCoordinates: Kar kwan ma ok adier. Tem nene latitude gi longitude.
contribute.errorLocationPermission: Yie thuolo mar donjo kama intie ok oher. Tem yie thuolo.
contribute.errorLocationFailed: Owetho iwanyo kar dak. Tem ket kar kwan gi lwedri.
contribute.parseError: Format ma ok adier. Tem ket link mar Google Maps ma adier kata kar kwan.

uber.selectPreferred: Yier vuolo mar wuoth ma iprefero

uber.uberXDesc: Wuoth ma nengone ok podo e ndalo duto
